## Code Blocks

The copy code button is always there by default.

### Simple Block

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

```js
new Sequence()
    .effect()
.play()
```

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

new Sequence()

### Text Markers

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.


#### Mark selection of text

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.


```js "Sequence()" /Even.*supported/
new Sequence()
    .effect()
.play()
//'Even regular expressions are supported'
```
#### Mark as inserted or deleted

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi.

```js ins=".scaleToObject" del=".scaletoobject"
new Sequence()
    .effect()
        .scaletoobject
        .scaleToObject
.play()
//'Even regular expressions are supported'
```
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.


```diff lang="js"
new Sequence()
    .effect()
-       .scaletoobject
+       .scaleToObject
.play()
```

#### Mark a line

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.


```js {2}
new Sequence()
    .effect()
.play()
```
#### Or multiple ones

```js {2-4,6}
new Sequence()
    .effect()
        .file()
        .name()
        .scaleToObject()
.play()
```
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.


## Details or Accordions

Perfect for questions of issues, the answers is hidden but default and allow to show more questions/issues on screen.

<details>
<summary>How can I install the patreon module?</summary>

Read the doc !

</details>


## Asides or Callouts

### Note Aside

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

#### Simple notes

:::note
A simple note, handy to convey a notable info
:::

#### Nested notes

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam,

:::note
You can nest any Markdown content types inside an aside !

```js
new Sequence()
.effect()
.play()
```
:::

## Images

We can display images like this with the following code

```mdx
import { Image } from 'astro:assets'
import JB2Abanner from '/src/assets/img/jb2a-wiki-banner-02.png'

<p align="center">
  <Image src={JB2Abanner} alt="JB2A Banner" style="width: 50%;"/>
</p>
```

And get this result

import { Image } from 'astro:assets'
import JB2Abanner from '/src/assets/img/jb2a-wiki-logo.webp'

<p align="center">
  <Image src={JB2Abanner} alt="JB2A Banner" style="width: 50%;"/>
</p>
